casebody.data:
Marcus Andrew BURRAGE, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES. No. 12-7515. Supreme Court of the United States April 29, 2013.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit granted limited to Questions 1 and 2 presented by the petition.
